title: [FSX] FS Global Real Weather 1.7 build 25
description:
***************************************************
*  		  P I L O T ' S			  *
*  F S   G L O B A L    R E A L    W E A T H E R  *
*               Download Version                  *
*                                                 *
*             <a href=" http://www.fsim.net" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.fsim.net</a>                *
***************************************************


===================
SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
===================

Your system has to fulfill the following requirements to use FS Global Real Weather:

.) Microsoft .NET-Framework 4.0 (http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17851)
.) Microsoft Flight Simulator FSX SP2/Acceleration Pack or LockeedMartin Prepar3D 1.4/2.1
.) Most current version ofFSUIPC (unregistered version is sufficient)
.) Internet Connection
.) about 20 MB Festplattenspeicher

NOTE: FS Global Real Weather uses approximately 400 MB of RAM.


============
INSTALLATION
============

Start the installation by clicking the file "setup.exe" which comes in the ZIP archive you
just downloaded. You can then choose the language you want the setup to be run. Follow the
instructions on the screen; you can freely choose the location to install FS Global Real Weather
to; the installation folder does not have to be the folder of an installed simulator.

NOTE: FS Global Real Weather does not create registry settings during installation and also does
not change system files.

NOTE (FSX/P3D): Some of the optional features of FS Global Real Weather require at least the free
version of FSUIPC to be installed. We recommend to install FSUIPC when setups asks for this. If you
use FS Global Real Weather without FSUIPC, a few important features will not be available.


================
TROUBLE SHOOTING
================

If you run into troubles during installation, please contact support at <a class="__cf_email__" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" data-cfemail="d2b4a1b5a0a592b4beabe0a2bbbebda6a1fcb1bdbf">[email&#160;protected]</a><script cf-hash='f9e31' type="text/javascript">
/* <![CDATA[ */!function(){try{var t="currentScript"in document?document.currentScript:function(){for(var t=document.getElementsByTagName("script"),e=t.length;e--;)if(t[e].getAttribute("cf-hash"))return t[e]}();if(t&&t.previousSibling){var e,r,n,i,c=t.previousSibling,a=c.getAttribute("data-cfemail");if(a){for(e="",r=parseInt(a.substr(0,2),16),n=2;a.length-n;n+=2)i=parseInt(a.substr(n,2),16)^r,e+=String.fromCharCode(i);e=document.createTextNode(e),c.parentNode.replaceChild(e,c)}}}catch(u){}}();/* ]]> */</script>
and attach a detailed description of the problem that occured.
